DANCAN MBAABU

I am a Data analyst, Freelancer Mathematician, and a Technical Academic Writer

About

As a Computer Science graduate, specialized in data analysis, My foundation in statistical analysis is solid, within proficiency in hypothesis testing, correlation, regression, and understanding key metrics such as mean, median, variance, and standard deviation. I am particularly skilled in programming languages tailored for data manipulation and analysis, such as Python, R, and SPSS. My background ensures that I am well-prepared to craft insightful reports and leverage data to drive impactful business outcomes. I am enthusiastic about the opportunity to leverage my analytical prowess to contribute to your team's success in a meaningful way.

Data & Analyst.

I bring a wealth of expertise to the table. My experience encompasses a comprehensive range of skills including data collection and processing, where I have managed, and refined large datasets to unearth critical insights that can contribute in strategic decision-making.
